quote: No one sheds like this family, it's like a bunch of Chewbaccas.
title: Human Flesh

quote: Frowny face? All I've been is super nice to you and this is the thanks I get? I loved you, I loved you like a horse, which is my favorite animal. You know what, let's just stop before we both say something we'll regret, like that horses are better than cows. I regret that, but it's true.
title: Sacred Cow

quote: Let's release the lobster from whence it came! The supermarket!
title: Lobsterfest

quote: I already picked a corner for the bathroom. That one, where I went.
title: Lobsterfest

quote: Bob, Gene, look at yourselves; you're father and son! You're supposed to love each other, not kill each other; this isn't the Bible!
title: Beefsquatch

quote: You don't want to mess with my sister. She'll wear down your self-esteem over a period of years.
title: Ear-sy Rider

quote: If you think about it, any box could have vibrators in it.
title: Bob Fires the Kids

quote: You should know when you hold hands with me, you're holding hands with everything I've ever eaten.
title: The Unbearable Like-Linkeness of Gene

quote: My heart was murdered by the word "from." No one says "I from you!"
title: My Fuzzy Valentine

quote: Well, your honor, I couldn't see the meter because there was a kid standing in front of it. And he was exactly... meter-sized...
title: O.T.: The Outside Toilet

quote: Awww, Bobby! That's what I love about you. All your sad stories.
title: Two for Tina

quote: Remember, Tina - a nerd in the hand is worth... not really that much. Never mind.
title: Two for Tina

quote: I'm no hero. I put my bra on one boob at a time like everyone else.
title: Boyz 4 Now

quote: I was going to punch you, but I'm holding wine.
title: Seaplane!

quote: It's a man cave. And Tina's going spelunking.
title: My Big Fat Greek Bob

quote: Kids are horrible. Why do we keep making them?
title: Bob and Deliver

quote: Nonsense, or Mom-sense?
title: Slumber Party

quote: "Danger" is my middle name. But I spell it R-U-T-H.
title: Presto, Tina-o

quote: I'm having my own Super Bowl blowout this year. I'm holding all of my BM's until halftime, when I will make a "Super Bowel!"
title: Easy Com-mercial, Easy Go-mercial

quote: You know a lot about bat mitzvahs for someone who thought Chanukkah was Han Solo and Chewbacca's baby.
title: Mazel Tina

quote: I should write a parenting book. Call it, "Hey You, I Saw That! Put It Back!"
title: The Kids Run Away

quote: Where's Tina? At home, crying into her butt?
title: Tina and the Real Ghost

quote: One man's trash is another man's Christmas gift for Dad!
title: Father of the Bob

quote: Sorry, ballroom's been cancelled. The teacher just waltzed out of here. Get it? I'm kidding. She died.
title: Bob Actually

quote: Okay class, today we're going to dissect a banana. We only have two, so get into groups of thirteen.
title: Bob Actually
